response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $1,300,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fair market value and a favorable deal for you. We understand the significance of this investment to you, and we are confident that our product will exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1300000}
